summary: REQ-6 appears implemented by updating weather advice generation to include explicit actionable guidance (umbrella, dress warmly, stay hydrated) with emojis in titles/messages. REQ-7 appears implemented by adjusting AdviceBanner layout classes for wrapping and adding emoji-capable font fallbacks; dark/light styling is present.

hallucinated_features.description: AdviceBanner now selects and renders condition-specific lucide-react icons (Umbrella/Snowflake/Wind/etc.) based on weather/advice type.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to preserve rendering of provided title/message (including emojis) and prevent layout regressions; it did not request adding/changing icon logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Global color palette/design tokens in :root and .dark were significantly changed ("Warm, sunny color palette"), beyond emoji/wrapping requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focused on advice text generation and AdviceBanner emoji/wrapping behavior; it did not request a theme/palette redesign.
